content: in this legal case the court has made a final decision involving several parties one party was declared in default and another partys payment demand was partially upheld the court also opened a succession and identified the legal heirs a division project for the property was approved and the court ordered the drawing of lots to allocate it among the parties certain exceptions and counterclaims were rejected the court addressed the reimbursement of expenses and ordered the payment of a specific amount to one party the court described the properties involved and determined their value the judgment is final and can be appealed the costs of the litigation will be shared equally among the parties the outcome of the drawing of lots will be transcribed and the property will be divided accordingly
